summary_raw: I am an applied AI specialist and DPhil graduate from the University of Oxford who thrives at the intersection of deep research, hardware-aware engineering, business communication, and commercial strategy. My focus is on translating complex technological breakthroughs, from AI applied to multimodal neuroimaging to in-memory computing, into scalable, market-ready solutions that solve critical industry challenges. I have a consistent track record of delivering substantial impact: ◆ Driving Technical Innovation: At Synthara AG, I helped pioneer the deployment of advanced AI and signal-processing algorithms for novel in-memory computing IP, delivering a 100x performance and efficiency gain. This work resulted in a pending patent and established a new technological benchmark for the company. ◆ Advancing Healthcare AI: As a Doctoral Researcher and in collaboration with Roche Pharma and GE Healthcare, I developed open-source software that boosted Alzheimer's imaging segmentation accuracy by 12%, accelerated analysis speeds by 90%, and developed AI models that identified 191 statistically significant factors in brain aging. ◆ Commercializing Research: At Rolls-Royce, I employed agent-based models to simulate market dynamics for hybrid-electric aircraft. My analysis and strategic recommendations directly enabled the establishment of two new business branches valued at over $840M per year. I am driven by the challenge of building, mentoring, and leading teams to tackle ambitious deep-tech problems. I seek opportunities in technical leadership or strategic roles to leverage my full-stack expertise to build transformative products and ventures. Core Competencies: Artificial Intelligence (AI) & Deep Learning (CNNs, LLMs, RL) | Embedded Systems & In-Memory Computing | Business Development & Go-to-Market Strategy | Multimodal Data Science (Neuroimaging, Signal Processing) | R&D Commercialization | Project Leadership Let's connect if you:- can teach me something new and mentor me- feel that I could advise you in your early career- are facing an engineering problem that my skills could support

experience.title: Doctoral Researcher — Quantifying Brain Ageing using AI and Multi-Modal Neuroimaging

Advanced diagnostic capabilities for physically impaired patients by pioneering deep learning models that translate structural MRI data into functional brain connectivity maps.

Partnered with Roche Pharma's R&D teams to demonstrate the commercial potential of the research, successfully translating academic findings into scalable models for early drug development and biomarker discovery.
